alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:25PM CDT until July 04 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CLAY...SOUTHERN YORK AND FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairmont, or 17 miles south of York, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Fairmont and McCool Junction around 635 PM CDT. Exeter around 655 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 360 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
